descriptionNullable:
### Context

CIFAR100 images are originally 32x32. For modern CNN architectures (such as Resnet18) we have to upscale these images to proper size (256x256). Doing this upscaling during data loading can cause CPU bottleneck. So here I have preporcessed the images to 256x256 so that you can directly load them.


### Content

Images are split into train test following original CIFAR100. Both train and test contain 100 directories. Each of these directories contain images corresponding to that label.


### Acknowledgements

All credit goes to the original authors of CIFAR100 dataset. I claim no credit for myself.
title: CIFAR100 256x256
subtitle: CIFAR100 images upscaled to 256x256
description:

CIFAR100 images are originally 32x32. For modern CNN architectures (such as Resnet18) we have to upscale these images to proper size (256x256). Doing this upscaling during data loading can cause CPU bottleneck. So here I have preporcessed the images to 256x256 so that you can directly load them.


### Content

Images are split into train test following original CIFAR100. Both train and test contain 100 directories. Each of these directories contain images corresponding to that label.

All credit goes to the original authors of CIFAR100 dataset. I claim no credit for myself.
